title: Black Market Dealer
description: A mysterious figure offers you a power potion.

choice_1.text: Buy it (-20 Gold, +2 Atk to random gladiator)

title: Traveling Healer
description: A wandering healer offers his services to your ludus.

choice_1.text: Hire him (-15 Gold, fully heal one gladiator)

title: Food Caravan
description: A merchant caravan passes through with surplus supplies.

choice_1.text: Trade gold for food (-10 Gold, +40 Food)

choice_2.text: Rob the caravan (+30 Food, risk gladiator injury)

title: Arena Sponsor
description: A wealthy senator wants to sponsor your next fight.

title: Escaped Slave
description: A runaway slave begs for shelter at your ludus.

choice_1.text: Take him in (free Slave added to roster)

title: Training Grounds Fire
description: A fire breaks out in the training area!

choice_2.text: Let it burn (random gladiator loses 20 HP)

title: Veteran Trainer
description: An old gladiator master offers to train your fighters.

choice_1.text: Hire him (-30 Gold, +5 Atk to all gladiators)

title: Plague Outbreak
description: A terrible plague sweeps through the slave quarters. Your gladiators are at risk.

choice_2.text: Let it pass (all gladiators lose 15 HP)

title: Gambling Den
description: A gambler challenges you. 'Double or nothing, lanista!'

choice_1.text: Gamble 20 Gold (50% chance: +40 or lose it)

title: Noble's Banquet
description: A Roman noble invites you to a grand feast. He may offer patronage.

choice_2.text: Send a gladiator as entertainment (+40 Gold, gladiator loses 10 HP)

title: Gladiator Revolt
description: Tensions rise in the barracks. Your gladiators demand better conditions!

choice_1.text: Improve conditions (-15 Gold, heal all gladiators)

choice_2.text: Crack down (random gladiator loses 25 HP, +10 Gold)

title: Weapon Shipment
description: A weapons dealer arrives with fine gladius swords and tridents.

choice_1.text: Buy weapons (-25 Gold, +3 Atk to all)

title: Drought Season
description: A drought hits the region. Food prices have doubled!

choice_1.text: Stock up before prices rise (-15 Gold, +30 Food)

title: Crowd Favorite
description: The crowd chants for your strongest gladiator! His fame spreads across Rome.

choice_2.text: Use fame for training (+3 Atk to random gladiator)

title: Rival Ludus Raid
description: A rival ludus sends thugs to sabotage your training grounds!

choice_2.text: Fight back (random gladiator loses 15 HP, +15 Gold looted)
